title: Addons management
pageDescription: This section describes the operations that can be used to manage Kubernetes cluster addons. Each operation is accompanied by step-by-step instructions.
shortDescription: How to view, install and remove addons in a Kubernetes cluster
metaDescription: How to view, install and remove addons in a Kubernetes cluster
